message.raw:
Change Unix DirIter next to use readdir instead of readdir_r.

readdir is actually threadsafe on modern Unix, and readdir_r
is depecated in very modern versions of Linux.  Thus, switch
to using readdir exclusively.  Also mark it as NOLINT, since
the linter doesn't yet know this fact.
